plot: A misguided new teacher takes advantage of her captive kindergarten audience and turns their first day of school into a therapy session.
title: Happy Crackers
plot_es: A misguided new teacher takes advantage of her captive kindergarten audience and turns their first day of school into a therapy session.
plot_en: A misguided new teacher takes advantage of her captive kindergarten audience and turns their first day of school into a therapy session.
